attributes.action: stop government funding for the BBC / Abolish the Licence fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We don't feel it's fair being forced to pay for BBC Services.
If the BBC are confident that they are providing a good service, let them fund it through advertising.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop government funding for the BBC / Abolish the Licence fee."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11100.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoTvLicenceFee/
